item.title: LNMP 與 wordpress
item.description: Install And Setting Nginx install 可以透過 apt show 或 apt search 去查詢 nginx 版本 $ sudo apt install nginx -y # 安裝 服務使用 $ sudo systemctl start nginx.service $ sudo systemctl stop nginx.service $ sudo systemctl restart nginx.service $ sudo systemctl status nginx.service Check Nginx Web Service $ ps -aux | grep nginx root 12900 0.0 0.0 124976 1420 ? Ss 21:03 0:00 nginx: master process /usr/sbin/nginx -g daemon on; master_process on; www-data 12901 0.
